name: SBA Emerging Leaders initiative
objective: Emerging Leaders is a free educational series that provides executives with the organizational framework and resources to build sustainable businesses and support economic development within underserved communities.
applicant_types: State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: In FY 2022, 78% of T.H.R.I.V.E. participants obtained revenue growth, and 66% of participants were successful at creating or retaining jobs. Additionally, 93% of participants indicated that they would recommend the program to other business owners.

authorizations.text: 15 USC 637(b)(1)(A)(Section 8(b)(1)(A) of the Small Business Act.).
